title: Bank of Canada governor says AI could be both good and bad for Canada's economy
description: OTTAWA — The Bank of Canada says it doesn't know how new artificial intelligence products will affect the Canadian economy. Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem says the technology has the potential for both economic benefit and harm.
content:
OTTAWA — The Bank of Canada says it doesn't know how new artificial intelligence products will affect the Canadian economy.
Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem says the technology has the potential for both economic benefit and harm.

title: Donald Trump Jr. Pitches ‘Patriotic Capitalism’ at Saudi Summit
description: His firm, 1789 Capital, has been investing in artificial intelligence and defense technology — and, he said, it has an “understanding” of President Trump’s plans.
content:
On Wednesday morning in Riyadh, Donald Trump Jr. talked to a roomful of business leaders about what it’s like to make investments as the president’s son.

title: Giving Nvidia's Blackwell chip to China would slash US's AI advantage, experts say
description: If the Trump administration allows Nvidia to sell a version of its best AI chip to China, as the President opened the door to on Wednesday, experts say it would severely decrease the American advantage in artificial intelligence.
content:
It could also effectively spell the end of U.S. chip export restrictions, which were put in place in 2022 to make sure Beijing's military would not benefit from American technology, and to slow the development of China's AI efforts.

title: Caterpillar Stock Hit a Record Wednesday-AI Had a Lot To Do With It
description: Caterpillar reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue on demand for equipment needed for artificial intelligence data centers.
content: Caterpillar (CAT) shares skyrocketed to an all-time high when the big farm and construction machines maker easily beat profit and sales expectations, with strong demand for data center power-generation equipment more than offsetting tariff headwinds.... [1080 chars]

title: Apple hits $4 trillion market value as new iPhone models revitalize sales
description: APPLE briefly topped $4 trillion in market value for the first time on Tuesday, the third Big Tech company to hit the milestone, as robust demand for its latest iPhone models allayed fears over its slow progress in the artificial intelligence (AI) race.

title: Amazon to invest $5 billion in South Korea AI data centers
description: SEOUL — Amazon will invest over $5 billion to build artificial intelligence (AI) data centers in South Korea by 2031, Seoul said Wednesday, calling it the country’s largest-ever foreign investment.
content:
SEOUL — Amazon will invest over $5 billion to build artificial intelligence (AI) data centers in South Korea by 2031, Seoul said Wednesday, calling it the country’s largest-ever foreign investment.

title: Microsoft holds 27% of OpenAI in revamped partnership
